import React from 'react'; import './index.css'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import TeamIll from '../../assets/team-based-ill.svg'; import { Col, Row, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Contact from '../Contact'; import MaterialIcon from 'material-icons-react'; class ServicePage extends React.Component{ render() { return(

Services

From idea to Implementation, our dynamic combination of design thinking, effective engineering and in-depth analysis ensure we're are delivering value that helps your buisness grow into the future.

We Offer 3 Options to bring your vision to life.
Team
Fixed Price
Module

Team Based Projects

Your Idea is flexible and requirements may evolve - we do a couple of discovery calls/meetings to understand the idea and give you an estimate.

  • Multidisciplinary provided based on features needed.
  • Build anything from simple prototypes, mvp’s to complex solutions.
  • Frequent updates allow you you play an active role in the development of your unique solution.
Offers open ended access to a capable development team, when your project doesn't have a well defined end.

Fixed-Price Projects

Your Idea is flexible and requirements may evolve - we do a couple of discovery calls/meetings to understand the idea and give you an estimate.

  • Multidisciplinary provided based on features needed.
  • Build anything from simple prototypes, mvp’s to complex solutions.
  • Frequent updates allow you you play an active role in the development of your unique solution.
Offers open ended access to a capable development team, when your project doesn't have a well defined end.

What's Your Vision?

Get in touch and see how our team can help you realize it.
); } } export default ServicePage;
